Package game.items

Class FlaskOfCrimsonTears

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.FlaskOfCrimsonTears
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable, Resettable
public class FlaskOfCrimsonTears extends Item implements Resettable
A flask which the player owns, that can be consumed to heal a certain amount. The flask has a limited number of uses.
Author:
Amirul Mohammad Azizol 32619898
See Also:
